mapper.select: select jud_id, jud_category, jud_areacity, jud_status, jud_frequency, jud_tradename, jud_site, jud_longitude, jud_dimensionality, jud_auctiontime, jud_willnum, jud_onlooker, jud_currentprice, jud_startingprice, jud_valuation, jud_bidIncrement, jud_cashdeposit, jud_announcement, jud_remind, jud_picture, jud_disposeunit, jud_linkman from judiciary where jud_id = #{judId}

select jud_id, jud_category, jud_areacity, jud_status, jud_frequency, jud_tradename, jud_site, jud_longitude, jud_dimensionality, jud_auctiontime, jud_willnum, jud_onlooker, jud_currentprice, jud_startingprice, jud_valuation, jud_bidIncrement, jud_cashdeposit, jud_announcement, jud_remind, jud_picture, jud_disposeunit, jud_linkman from judiciary
mapper.insert: insert into judiciary(jud_category, jud_areacity, jud_status, jud_frequency, jud_tradename, jud_site, jud_longitude, jud_dimensionality, jud_auctiontime, jud_willnum, jud_onlooker, jud_currentprice, jud_startingprice, jud_valuation, jud_bidIncrement, jud_cashdeposit, jud_announcement, jud_remind, jud_picture, jud_disposeunit, jud_linkman) values (#{judCategory}, #{judAreacity}, #{judStatus}, #{judFrequency}, #{judTradename}, #{judSite}, #{judLongitude}, #{judDimensionality}, #{judAuctiontime}, #{judWillnum}, #{judOnlooker}, #{judCurrentprice}, #{judStartingprice}, #{judValuation}, #{judBidincrement}, #{judCashdeposit}, #{judAnnouncement}, #{judRemind}, #{judPicture}, #{judDisposeunit}, #{judLinkman})
mapper.update:
update judiciary
jud_category = #{judCategory},
jud_areacity = #{judAreacity},
jud_status = #{judStatus},
jud_frequency = #{judFrequency},
jud_tradename = #{judTradename},
jud_site = #{judSite},
jud_longitude = #{judLongitude},
jud_dimensionality = #{judDimensionality},
jud_auctiontime = #{judAuctiontime},
jud_willnum = #{judWillnum},
jud_onlooker = #{judOnlooker},
jud_currentprice = #{judCurrentprice},
jud_startingprice = #{judStartingprice},
jud_valuation = #{judValuation},
jud_bidIncrement = #{judBidincrement},
jud_cashdeposit = #{judCashdeposit},
jud_announcement = #{judAnnouncement},
jud_remind = #{judRemind},
jud_picture = #{judPicture},
jud_disposeunit = #{judDisposeunit},
jud_linkman = #{judLinkman},
where jud_id = #{judId}
